General.Name: Wesana Health Holdings Inc
General.Description: Wesana Health Holdings Inc. does not have significant operations. Previously, it was developing evidence-based formulations and protocols that empower patients to overcome neurological, psychological, and mental health ailments caused by trauma. The company is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois.
